member.name: T:FindNextBiggerNumber.NumberSeeker
member.summary: Designed to search for next bigger number.

member.name: M:FindNextBiggerNumber.NumberSeeker.FindNextBiggerNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Method searches for the next greater number that consitsts of digits of the original number.

member.name: M:FindNextBiggerNumber.NumberSeeker.SwapElements(System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: simple method that swaps elements in the array.

member.name: M:FindNextBiggerNumber.NumberSeeker.GenerateSet(System.Int32[])
member.returns: next lexicographic permutation of source array.

member.name: M:FindNextBiggerNumber.NumberSeeker.ExtractDigits(System.Int32)
member.summary: Simple method that turns number into array of its digits.
member.returns: array of integers that represents number as its digits in the same order.
